column2: Tough Love
In the bedchamber last night, you found yourself so excited that your more bestial side may have emerged for a moment.
Oh, it's just a scratch.
Werewolf Limb Regeneration
Though your crippling injury might have been fatal for normal men, for one of the wolf, even the worst of wounds heal with time.
Much better.
Werewolf Eats Prisoner

Last night was a full moon, and though you tried to restrain yourself, you became the wolf again and broke free of your chambers. While you don't remember exactly what happened, you fear your court is a head smaller today.
Acknowledge your mistake and apologize.
Cover it up.
Blood of the Wolf
As you reach maturity, so too does the power in your blood. But is it the blood of a human or the blood of the wolf?
What does my future hold?
Werewolf Challenge

One of your subjects, an arrogant pup who thinks himself strong, has dared to challenge you in single combat for rule of the wolves. The duel is to the death, but refusing it would make you seem a coward.
Of course I must accept!
But I might actually lose...
Challenge Accepted
As expected, your liege has accepted your challenge. You will battle him in two weeks time.
He will die like the dog he is.
Challenge Refused
Your liege has refused your right to challenge him, dishonoring himself in the process.
That coward will pay for this!
Werewolf Challenge
The duel begins at sunset. You and your opponent shift forms as the moon rises over the night sky, both knowing that only one will see tomorrow.
Strike hard and fast.
Pause, and wait for your opponent to move.
Werewolf Challenge

Your opponent lunges at you quickly, and you move to deflect the strike. Too late, you realize that the attack was a feint, and you soon find sharp teeth in your neck. You are flung to the ground, bleeding badly and unable to retaliate any longer.
This is the end, then.
Werewolf Challenge
Your opponent lunges at you quickly but hastily. You deftly deflect the attack, and send him several paces behind you with his own momentum, giving you a chance to strike back.
Strike hard and fast.
Pause, and wait for your opponent to move.
Werewolf Challenge
Your opponent pauses in the combat, awaiting your move.
Take advantage of his hesitation.
Wait for him to strike first.
Werewolf Challenge
Your attack was successful! You tear out half of your opponent's throat in a lunge at his neck, and he now lies defeated and bleeding heavily beneath you.
Finish it.
Werewolf Challenge
Your opponent has defeated you utterly, and deals you the killing blow as you are helpless to resist.
It was a battle worthy of the greatest of warriors.
Offer of Lycanthropy

You've received a strange letter from [From.GetTitledFirstName] in which he claims to be an immortal and powerful werewolf (whatever that is). Stranger still, the letter contains an offer to share this "gift!"
Why of course!
Politely decline.
This is heresy!
Offer of Lycanthropy Accepted
[From.GetTitledFirstName] has returned your offer and gladly accepts it.
Excellent.
Offer of Lycanthropy Declined
[From.GetTitledFirstName] has returned your offer along with a regretful decline.
They don't know what they're missing.
Offer of Lycanthropy Declined 2
[From.GetTitledFirstName] has returned your offer along with vehement scorn and plans to expose you as a monster to the world!
Damn!
You Grow Stronger
As a werewolf, the long decades do not wear away at you, but instead make you healthier. You awaken today feeling wiser and stronger than ever before.
Excellent.
Assassination Plot
Perhaps I can take advantage of my secret to kill [Root.PlotTarget.GetTitledName] without anyone recognizing me
He'll be attacked by a wolf while hunting.
Attacking personally puts the attacker at a slight risk of dying.
It's not worth risking exposure.
Wolf Attack
I had thought today was a good days to go hunting, but no sooner did I step foot in the forest that I was set upon by a vicious wolf
I can't get it off!
Looks like my quarry has come to me
Assassination Detected
[target_victim.GetTitledName] is dead, but not without incident.  A survivor saw me shapeshift.  Now everyone know I did it, and that I'm a werewolf.

[target_victim.GetTitledName] is dead, but not without incident.  A survivor saw [werewolf_attacker.GetTitledName] shapeshift.  Now everyone know I did it, and that [werewolf_attacker.GetSheHe]'s a werewolf.
That's... half good.
A Wolf-Man
I tried to fight it off, but my hands were no match for the tooth and claw of the wolf.  When it was done with me, as it walked away, I saw the wolf change into the form of a man.
It was [werewolf_attacker.GetTitledName]! I hope someone else saw it.
Target Slain
Success! I've ripped that wretched [target_victim.GetTitledName] apart with my own teeth.
Success!  [werewolf_attacker.GetName] ripped [target_victim.GetTitledName] apart.
Success!  I'm not sure how [werewolf_attacker.GetTitledName] did it, but the wolves attacked [target_victim.GetTitledName] and slew [target_victim.GetHerHim].
No less that [target_victim.GetSheHe] deserves.
Tooth and Nail
I tried to fight it off, but my hands were no match for the tooth and claw of the wolf.
Seems it was the better hunter...
Attack Failed
I lunged at [target_victim.GetTitledName], but [target_victim.GetSheHe] threw me off. Before I could attack again, [target_victim.GetHerHis] guards returned and I had to flee.
[werewolf_attacker.GetTitledName] attacked [target_victim.GetTitledName], but was driven off by guards before [werewolf_attacker.GetSheHe] could deliver the killing blow.
We need to try again.
Wolf Attack
The wolf fought hard, but I fought harder.  I managed to throw the wolf off before it could cause any serious injury, then it ran off as my guards arrived.
What a strange wolf...
Werewolf Revealed
When I attacked [target_victim.GetTitledName], not only did [target_victim.GetSheHe] survive, but he caught me transforming.
When [werewolf_attacker.GetTitledName] attacked [target_victim.GetTitledName], not only did [target_victim.GetSheHe] survive, but he caught [werewolf_attacker.GetFirstName] transforming.
I've been exposed.
Werewolf Revealed
I managed to throw off the wolf, but as it escaped, I'm sure I saw it transform into [werewolf_attacker.GetTitledName]
[werewolf_attacker.GetTitledName] is a werewolf.
Assassination Failed... Catastrophically
[target_victim.GetTitledName] was a better fighter than I thought. As I leapt upon [target_victim.GetHerHim], [target_victim.GetSheHe] brought [target_victim.GetHerHis] sword up and slashed my belly.
I don't think I'm going to make it out of this...
Assassination Failed... Catastrophically
Instead of dying like [target_victim.GetSheHe] should have, [target_victim.GetSheHe] slew the wolf and revealed that it was really [werewolf_attacker.GetTitledName]
At least [werewolf_attacker.GetSheHe] died without saying anything about me.
Werewolf Slain
As the wolf leapt at me, I brought up my blade and drove it into its belly.  As it bled out, its form slowly shifted into that of [werewolf_attacker.GetTitledName]
A werewolf.
Werewolf Revealed
Recent events have revealed that your [GetFromRelation], [From.GetBestName], is a monster through-and-through - A werewolf, stalking the people at night.
Recent events have caused your [GetFromRelation], [From.GetBestName], to be revealed as a powerful werewolf.
[From.GetBestName] has foolishly revealed [From.GetHerselfHimself] as a werewolf.  I must be cautious - people may be looking for others.
[From.GetBestName] has been revealed as a werewolf to the realm.
This monster must be destroyed
Perhaps I can take advantage of people's fear towards [From.GetHerHim]
If you have the authority, you'll have reason to arrest and execute [From.GetBestName].
Our enemies will tremble before [From.GetHerHim].
[From.GetSheHe] is a fool, exposing [From.GetHerselfHimself]
It's no concern of mine
Glad to see more of us
[From.GetSheHe] could use a friend at a time like this
An Opening...

Observing [plot_leader.PlotTarget.GetTitledName], I've noticed that [plot_leader.PlotTarget.GetSheHe] is fond of hunting.  During [plot_leader.PlotTarget.GetHerHis] next hunt, I could attack as a wolf and no one would be the wiser.
When is [plot_leader.PlotTarget.GetHerHis] next hunt?
It will be a long wait before I can do this.
I'll invite [plot_leader.PlotTarget.GetHerHim] on a hunting trip myself.
Tell [This.GetTitledName] of the idea to kill [This.PlotTarget.GetTitledName]
Perhaps I can spread rumors of a rare animal in the area.
Forget the hunt – I'll just pay the guards to get “lost” on a normal trip.
This is a bad idea – if I attack directly, I could get hurt.
The Plan is Ready
The hunting trip is finally ready.  Shall we get this plan underway?
All this waiting will finally pay off
The situation's changed.  Let's not do this.
A Plot
[From.GetTitledName] has a plan to get [plot_target.GetTitledName] alone and attack him as a wolf.  No one would know it was anything other than a wild animal attacking.
[From.GetTitledName] has a plan to get a trained wolf to attack [plot_target.GetTitledName].  No one should know it was anything other than a wild animal attack.
Sounds like every thing is accounted for.
Arrange for a wolf to attack [plot_target.GetTitledName]
The Plan is Approved
[From.GetTitledFirstName] approves of my plan to have a “wolf” attack [plot_target.GetTitledName]
The hunt is on
The Plot Proceeds

[From.GetTitledFirstName] has let me know that the plot to kill [From.PlotTarget.GetTitledFirstName] is proceeding well. [From.PlotTarget.GetSubjectPronounCap] will soon be torn apart by a wolf while hunting.
Perfect.
Frenzy
In the heat of battle, I lost control of myself and turned into a wolf.  I killed many of my foes, but everyone there saw it.
Hopefully this will be limited to the commanders.
Hunger
No matter how much I eat, I can't seem to help but wolf down more and more.
I need meat.
Rage Across the Realm
Whenever the moon waxes toward full, I've been finding myself getting angrier and angrier.
Why bother containing my rage?
Running With The Wolves
After a night spent running in the wild with other wolves, I feel free in a way I never could before.
I should do this more often.
A Loud Awakening
I woke up this morning to the sound of a maid screaming when she saw the bed covered in blood.
What did I do last night?
They act like they've never seen me covered in blood before.
Boredom
The court has been boring for quite some time now.  While it has been boring, it has put people's suspicions about me out of their minds.
I guess boredom has its up-sides.
Lost Control
I lost control during the hunt and ended up tearing the prey to pieces.
At least I caught it. Technically.
The Thrill of the Fight
During that last battle, I completely lost myself in the thrill of the fight
I should let out the wolf more often
Regeneration
While my wounds would have laid low any normal man, my body has already overcome its weakness
Much better.
Supernatural Recovery
Although my body and mind had been broken and crippled, the strength of the wolf still runs through my blood and restores my body and mind.
I am renewed!
True Nature Revealed
After my sudden and inexplicable recovery, there's no longer any use in hiding who I am - Everyone now knows that I'm a werewolf.
At least I don't need to hide now.
There has been whisperings around the court – it seems that someone saw me howling at the moon a few nights ago.
Maybe they'll just think I'm crazy
There has been whisperings around the court – it seems that someone saw my hunt a few days ago, including making the kill.
They can't prove anything.

Waking up after a moon-frenzy is always a blur and you only vaguely recall the events of that night, but your muscles ache, your jaw is sore, and your throat hoarse.  You must have been howling for hours.
Waking up after a moon-frenzy is always a blur and you only vaguely recall the events of that night, but you're cold, wet, and still outside.  It seems you didn't even return home.

Waking up after a moon-frenzy is always a blur and you only vaguely recall the events of that night, but you feel wet and sticky.  As you look down, you find yourself covered in blood that doesn't smell like yours.  You vaguely remember making a kill, but not what...
I should wash up.
The peasants of [Root.GetName] are resisting all of my laws and declared that they refuse to submit to a monster
They better not try anything.
The peasants of [Root.GetName] are refusing to pay taxes, claiming they refuse to aid whatever monstrous plans I have.
I don't have any monstrous plans
My soldiers will force them to pay!
The soldiers in [Root.GetName] have been abandoning their duties and leaving the posts.  They claim that they refuse to serve a monster.
Bah! The weak flee while the strong remain!
I received new from [Root.GetName] that many bandits, cutpurses, and neer-do-wells that once resided there have fled to other realms.  It seems they fear being hunted and torn apart by werewolves.
As well they should.
The people of [Root.GetName] sleep soundly at night, knowing their lands are protected.  Where they once feared the howl of wolves, it now is a reassuring sound.
My people are safe.
Military recruitment is going strong in [Root.GetName].  There are rumors that I will turn those who distinguish themselves in battle, and many young men have joined the army to prove themselves.
And they will be rewarded.
I've been playing outside a lot, far away from everyone else, in the woods. Today I saw a wolf!  It came up and talked to me.  Well, it didn't really talk, but I knew what it wanted to say anyway.
I should tell [Root.Guardian.GetFirstName]!
I'll keep this secret. Adults won't understand.
My [GetFromRelation], [From.GetFirstName], has been playing off in the woods a lot, far from everyone else.  [From.GetSheHeCap] even claims to be talking to wolves.
Unsupervised play is good for a child.
[From.GetSheHeCap] shouldn't be allowed to do such dangerous things.
[From.GetFirstName] really enjoyed listening to how I was talking to the wolf, even if I don't think they believed me.
[From.GetFirstName] wasn't happy that I was playing out in the woods, so I'm not allowed to go there anymore.
I'm glad.
Aww.
[From.GetFirstName] has been a rather strange child.  Just yesterday, I saw [From.GetHerHim] growling at people when they got too close.
[From.GetFirstName] just had to have [From.GetHerHis] hair cut again.  It's growing way faster than normal, and [From.GetSheHe] seems to be growing body hair at a young age too...
It seems like every morning, we can't find [From.GetFirstName] in [From.GetHerHis] bed, and have to search all over for [From.GetHerHim], and every morning, we find [From.GetHerHim] sleeping outside.
This is very odd.
Is [From.GetSheHe] a werewolf like me?
[From.GetFirstName] says I shouldn't growl at people.  Even if they get to close and I don't like them.  [From.GetSheHeCap] was acting really strange about it.  Is [From.GetSheHe] planning something?
[From.GetFirstName] says I've been growing too much hair.  But this is the same amount of hair I've always grown.  And [From.GetSheHe] has more hair than me anyway!
[From.GetFirstName] seems worried that I keep sleeping outside.  I like sleeping outside, though.  The bed is too stuffy.
I'm not weird.
I was in the woods, playing with the wolves again, and today one of them started following me home.
Can I keep him?
It's normal for a child to bring home some wild animal and want to keep it as a pet, but a wolf is no ordinary animal.
[From.GetFirstName] will be fine.
That's a dangerous animal!
[From.GetFirstName] agreed to let me keep the wolf as a pet!
I'm gonna name him Hunter.

[From.GetFirstName]'s wolf doesn't seem to like anyone, and lashes out at anyone who comes near it.  Except for [From.GetFirstName], who it follows around like a lost puppy.  There's something unusual about that child.
It bit me!
As I have gotten older, my wolf has become fearful of me and avoids me.  I haven't mistreated it – what's going on?
He's not coming back, is he?
As I have gotten older, my wolf has become more domesticated and friendlier around members of the court
He's basically a dog now.
[FromFrom.GetFirstName] has been a very unusual child, and all the signs seem to be pointing to one thing – [FromFrom.GetSheHe] may a werewolf, or will at least grow to become one.
The child must be brought to a [Root.Religion.GetPriestTitle].
Lock [FromFrom.GetHerHim] up in the dungeon, where [FromFrom.GetSheHe] can't hurt anyone.
We must kill this abomination!
Excellent! I'll introduce [FromFrom.GetHerHim] to the realm!
Good for [FromFrom.GetHerHim].
There's nothing I can do about it.

[From.GetTitledFirstName] has brought the child [FromFromFrom.GetFirstName] before me.  [From.GetSheHeCap] has noticed some strange abilities and behavior from the child, and suspect that [FromFromFrom.GetSheHe] may be a werewolf.
I will pray for [Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName] to bless [FromFromFrom.GetHerHim] with strength.
I will pray for [Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName] to protect [FromFromFrom.GetHerHim] soul.
Some [GetSelectedIngredient_1] should encourage [FromFromFrom.GetHerHis] potential.
I will use some [GetSelectedIngredient_1] to exorcise the demon within [FromFromFrom.GetHerHim].
[From.GetTitledFirstName] is worrying too much.
I haven't done anything wrong, but [From.GetTitledFirstName] has locked me in the dungeon and called me a monster!
I didn't do anything! Please let me out!
[From.GetTitledFirstName] prayed over me and asked [From.Religion.GetRandomGodName] to protect me.
Protect me from what?
[From.GetTitledFirstName] prayed over my child.  The only left to do now is wait and trust [Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName].
Okay.
[From.GetTitledFirstName] performed some kind of ritual over me to get [From.Religion.GetRandomGodName] to help me.
Help me do what?
[From.GetTitledFirstName] performed a ritual over [FromFromFromFrom.GetFirstName] to get [From.Religion.GetRandomGodName] to help [FromFromFromFrom.GetHerHim].
We spoke to [From.GetTitledFirstName], and he thinks this is all an over-reaction.
I agree – there's nothing wrong with me.
I spoke to [From.GetTitledFirstName], but [From.GetSheHe] doesn't see the problem.  [From.GetSheHeCap] thinks I'm just over-reacting.
What does [From.GetSheHe] know.
Now that my [GetFromRelation], [From.GetFirstName] is of age, [From.GetSheHe] should reveal [From.GetHerselfHimself] as a werewolf and take [From.GetHerHis] proper place in society.
Yes, it is time.
No, [From.GetSheHe] can move at [From.GetHerHis] own pace.
My [GetFromRelation] feels that it's time for me to reveal myself as a werewolf.  This will prove that I am a true ruler and fit to lead my people.
But I'm not a werewolf...
I'll do it!
I'm not ready...
My [GetFromRelation] has listened to my suggestion, but it turns out that [From.GetSheHe] has not become a werewolf.
Oh.
My [GetFromRelation] has revealed [From.GetHerselfHimself] to the world. [From.GetSheHe] is strong and fit to rule.
My [GetFromRelation] has refused to reveal [From.GetHerselfHimself] to the world. I can only hope [From.GetSheHe] sees the light soon.
This is my [GetFromRelation], in whom I am well pleased.
I am disappointed.

On the night of my 16th birthday, I could feel a beast inside me take control.  I took on a form not of man nor wolf, but some powerful creatures in-between.  However, this was not enough to escape my prison, and all it did was let my captors know my nature.
Knowing won't save them.

In the middle of the night, there were strange sounds coming from the dungeon.  I brought guards only to find a monstrous wolf-man in [From.GetTitledName]'s cell – As I suspected, [From.GetSheHe] is a werewolf.
I knew it!
Everything has pressed so heavily on my, I feel my mind cracking under the strain.  I'm not only not in control of my own life, but I'm also losing control over the wolf within.
I have to keep trying anyway
It's easier to just give in.
Every part of my life has been terrible.  Is there any point in even trying to control what I am?
I should just let go.
My injuries have stuck with me.  My ability to heal has been weakened by trying to keep my power in check.
I should let go. Use the strength of the wolf.
I just need patience.  I'll heal in time.
I try to keep control over myself, but that just doesn't come naturally.  This just isn't me.
I should just let loose.
With the battle raging, the wolf in me wants to transform, fight the enemy myself, and feel their blood in my teeth.
No, I need to focus on commanding my troops.
Why should I hold myself back?
While I was traveling, some peasant boy starting mocking me in front of my traveling companions and the boy's friends.
Transforming and ripping his hand off would teach him not to mock a [Root.GetTitle].
I should just ignore him.

The last few days have been an unending chain of stress, complaining vassals, and “urgent” matters of trivial importance.  I want to transform and run off, spend some time away from the stresses of modern life and embrace the wolf.
It's time for the wolf to take over.
I need to stay in control.
